# EnumerableUtility.Range&lt;T&gt; method

Returns a range of values.

```csharp
public static IEnumerable<T> Range<T>(T start, int count, Func<T, T> increment)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | The type of object in the sequence. |
| start | The initial value. |
| count | The number of values. |
| increment | Increments the value. |

## Return Value

A sequence of values starting with the initial value.
